description: The world runs computers.  From small to large businesses, from the CEO down to level 1 support staff, everyone uses computers.  This course is designed to give you a practical perspective on computer security.  This course approaches computer security in a way that anyone can understand.  Ever wonder how your bank website is secure when you connect to it?  Wonder how other business owners secure their network?  Wonder how large data breaches happen?  This is practical computer security.  It will help you answer the question â€“ what should I focus on?
name: Introduction to Cybersecurity for Business
